greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Difference of the first two Stirling numbers of the first kind.
formula: a(n) = s(n, 1)-s(n, 2), s(n, m) = signed Stirling number of the first kind.
mathematica: Table[StirlingS1[n+1, 1] - StirlingS1[n+1, 2], {n, 0, 20}] (* or *) Table[(-1)^n n! (1+HarmonicNumber[n]), {n, 0, 20}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Feb 11 2016 *)
xref: Cf. A000254, A008275. Same as A000774 apart from signs.
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Mar 05 2003
